DKeep.logic

Class Level_1

  • java.lang.Object
    • DKeep.logic.Level_1

  • public class Level_1
extends java.lang.Object
    Level_1.java - Level 1 class. Creates the objects of level 1. Map, Hero and Guard. Evaluates level (complete, lost, uncompleted).
    Since:
    2018-04-01
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    André Esteves && Luís Diogo Silva

    • Constructor Detail

      • Level_1

        public Level_1()

    • Method Detail

      • createMap

        public static char[][] createMap()
        Creates the map for level 1. Like a matrix, char[][]. Size of 10x10. X -> wall. I -> Closed door. S -> Open door. H -> Hero. G -> Guard. l -> Lever.
        Returns:
        map of level 1, char[][] variable.

      • createHero

        public static Hero createHero()
        Creates the Hero for level 1 on his correct position. Hard coded. On the position [1,1] of the current map.
        Returns:
        Hero of level 1.

      • createGuard

        public static Guard createGuard()
        Creates the Guard for level 1 on his correct position. Hard coded. On the position [8,1] of the current map. There is created the standard Guard, Rookie Guard.
        Returns:
        Guard of level 1.

      • evalStatus

        public static int evalStatus(char[][] map,
                             Hero h,
                             Guard g)
        Evaluates the status of the current level.
        Parameters:
        map - Map char[][] of current level.
        h - Hero of the level.
        g - Guard [Rookie, Suspicious or Drunken] of the level.
        Returns:
        0, if no end game reached. 1, if victory condition reached, level 1 completed. 2, if defeat condition reached, level 1 lost, got caught by Guard.

      • createGuard

        public static Guard createGuard(java.lang.String personality)
        Creates the Guard for level 1 on his correct position. Hard coded. On the position [8,1] of the current map. There is created the Guard [Rookie, Suspicious or Drunken] depending on personality argument.
        Parameters:
        personality - Personality of the guard. if Novice -> Rookie Guard. else if Advanced -> Suspicious Guard. else -> Drunken Guard.
        Returns:
        Guard of level 1.
